0110000001100110 0110101010100110 1 -> sum: 1100101100001101, cout: 0
1000000001110011 1010111000001101 0 -> sum: 0010111010000000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
